content:
I am a cat. I can do anything a cat can do.

I will go hunt for mice.

*You hear the sound of mice scurrying in the walls*

I will stalk the mice and pounce on them.

*You successfully catch a mouse and bring it back to your owner*

I will meow to request food.

*Your owner gives you a bowl of cat food*

I will eat the food.

*You finish eating the food and begin grooming yourself*
